src:
Gobara ta tafka barna a kasuwar Balogun dake Legas
05 Nov 2019, 19:50 by Nura Ado Suleiman

Mummunar gobarar da ta shi a birnin Legas ta yi sanadin tafka hasarar tarin dukiya ta miliyoyin naira.

Gobarar ta soma tashi ne a wani bene mai hawa 6, layin Oluwole dake kasuwar Balogun yayinda, wata gobarar kuma ta kone shagunan dake bene mai hawa 3, a layin Dosunmu dake kasuwar.
Zuwa lokacin wallafa wannan labarai, babu Karin bayani kan musababbin tashin gobarar har kashi 2, sai dai hukumar bada agajin gaggawa ta jihar Legas ta ce sanar da shawo kan gobarar, bayan shafe tsawon lokaci jamiâ€™an kwana kwana na gwagwarmaya.
text:
A fire has devastated the Balogun market in Lagos
05 Nov 2019, 19:50 by Nura Ado Suleiman

The devastating fire in Lagos has cost millions of naira.

The fire started in a 6-storey building, the Oluwole line at Balogun market, while another fire burned shops in the 3-storey building in Dosunmu Market.
As of the time of publishing this report, there had been no further details about the cause of the fire in 2 volumes, but the Lagos State Emergency Management Agency said it had notified the fire after a long struggle.
